-e ---

𓏃 𓏄 𓏅 𓏆 𓈖 𓏏 #ḫnt #Khent Kante nieder vs hinter yonder 𓄖𓏏
𓏃 ⋍ 𓏅 Kanne canister ⇔ australis (south)
𓏃 ⋍ ≠ 𓇐 𓇏 𓆷 ≠ 𓃃 𓃄 𓃅 ≠ 𓋣
W17+ 𓏃 4th: PRO > FORe/FRo/FROm/FROnt/fourth/4th vs 𓇭 3rd/10 vs 𓏅 5th cans:#xnt: count front

𓏅 fore- four 4

𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 #ḫnt הnótos νότος 𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 #ḫnt кӑнтӑр kănt̬ăr Kanton "south" +++ 𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 #khnt көньяҡ könyaq™ кӱнегей künegey "south" 𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 #ḫnt •ḫnubt cənub cenüp جنوب gunūb™ ᏧᎦᏃᏮᎢ "south" <> ה nubia™

reverse 𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 #khnt တောင် taung "south" reverse 𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 #ḫnt ডান ḍan down 𓏃 𓏏 𓈖 reverse 南 nàng 𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 #khn™ দক্ষিণ dokkhin "south" दक्षिण dakṣiṇa 𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 #ksn™ kusini™ "south" <> zenith @ Swahili 𓏃 𓈖 ™ #xn™ दक्षिण dakṣiṇ दक्खिन dakkhin दक्खण dakkhaṇ दखन dakhan <> xeno 𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 #ḫnt תימנא taymnā "south" vs 𓇋 𓏠 𓈖 𓊿 west

𓏅 𓈖 𓏏 𓊝 | sail upstream, travel southward | ≠ kentern
𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 𓊝 | sail upstream, travel southward |
𓋴 𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 𓊛 | take southward | send SUND ⇔ Sudan > Süden south semit summit? +++
𓋴 𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 𓂉 | advance, promote | scandō “climb” => ascend (south is up ok) SEND 升官 shēngguān
𓋴 𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 𓊛 | advance, promote | ge'front 𐌲𐌰'promote 𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 < supero-menaute?
𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 brewīntwei (promote @ Prussian) ⇔ wind
𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 promote > προωθώ proothó (be)fördern > promovier повишавам povišavam promoma
𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 promote > propagovat повы́сить povýsitʹ ( ⇔ 𓏃 𓈖 propane) ᦵᦕᧀᦶᦕᧈ (ṗhoeyṗhae1)

𒃮𒊑 gaba ri confront ( 𒃮 = front 𓏅 )

𓐒

𒉺𒉌 pa-ni upon prono front > פְּנֵי pnéi לִפְנֵי לפני al'pne
𒉺𒉌𒅀 paʳni-ia pron'yo "my front" "before me" ⇔ πρόσοψη prósopsi
